title: Part 3 - COMPUTATION OF TAX
content:
Part 3 - COMPUTATION OF TAX
State Regulations

Subpart 3-1 - TAX BASES (§ 3-1.1 to 3-1.5)

Subpart 3-2 - GENERAL RULES (§ 3-2.1 to 3-2.11)

Subpart 3-3 - ENTIRE NET INCOME (§ 3-3.1 to 3-3.9)

Subpart 3-4 - INVESTMENT CAPITAL AND INVESTMENT INCOME (§ 3-4.1 to 3-4.9)

Subpart 3-5 - BUSINESS CAPITAL AND BUSINESS INCOME (§ 3-5.1 to 3-5.3)

Subpart 3-6 - EXAMPLES OF INCOME AND CAPITAL (§ 3-6.1 to 3-6.7)

Subpart 3-7 - CAPITAL LOSSES (§ 3-7.1 to 3-7.8)

Subpart 3-8 - COMPUTATION OF THE PRIOR NET OPERATING LOSS CONVERSION (PNOLC) SUBTRACTION (§ 3-8.1 to 3-8.12)

Subpart 3-9 - NET OPERATING LOSS AND NET OPERATING LOSS DEDUCTIONS FOR TAXABLE YEARS BEGINNING ON OR AFTER JANUARY 1, 2015 (§ 3-9.1 to 3-9.7)

Subpart 3-10 - Repealed

Subpart 3-11 - [Repealed] (§ 3-11.1)

Subpart 3-12 - [Repealed] (§ 3-12.1)

Subpart 3-13 - [Repealed] (§ 3-13.1 to 3-13.7)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
